text: Daniel Alves (born 15 March 1969) is a Portuguese rower. He competed in the men's double sculls event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Portugal Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Daniel Alves (rower)
